title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 60.7 - Final applications
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 60.7 - Final applications

State Regulations
(a) Applicants whose preliminary applications have been approved shall submit final
applications to the department's central office, which final applications shall
contain such further information, documentation and explanation regarding the
contents of the preliminary applications as may be necessary or appropriate for
the department to make a final determination. (b) The department may charge a fee to the
eligible applicant in order to recover the actual costs of preparing or
reviewing a draft environmental impact statement, if such a document is found
to be necessary by the department. All fees will be in accordance with 6 NYCRR
Part
617. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 5
ยง
60.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
